body_html:
note for TX1 users (https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/987306/jetson-tx1/internal-error-in-nvidia-driver-code-while-building-r0-12-or-master-tensorflow-on-tegra-tx1/2)

At least for Tensorflow r0.12, NVIDIA released a CUDA 8.0.64 version with Jetpack 3.0 for the TX2. From their forum it looked like they had issues with publicly released versions of CUDA 8.0.34 and nvcc for the TX1 that were NOT yet resolved.

@kwotsin not sure if this applies to you, but is the full version of CUDA that you are using?
@sunsided you're probably in the same boat as me on the TX1. I would try to contact NVIDIA and see if they have a fix that you can use. I have access to a TX2 that I will test with next.
